artist: Designer: Aaron Kaufman; Manufacturer: Baumgarten & Co., Baltimore
description: square bank in shape of safe; silver colored with multicolored "fortunes" on wheel that show through window at top; raised foliate design on top and sides; text on front
inscription:
Inscriptions and Sticker

on bottom, raised: [PAT]; on bottom, in black script: [Clara Leonard]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [G. 91 7-5-12 / \"Fortune Teller Savings Bank\" / 77650 3420 / 5500 / M95 7650]
title: "Fortune Teller Savings Bank " mechanical bank
